entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
